forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 53. West southwest wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Drizzle after 10pm. Mostly cloudy. Low around 47, with temperatures rising to around 49 overnight. South southwest wind 5 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon unfolds with a gentle embracing of the cool air, as a thin layer of clouds allows occasional shy glimmers of sunlight to spill onto the streets. With temperatures hovering near a brisk 53 degrees, a soft breeze kisses your skin, hinting at the seasonal chill that lingers in the shadows. However, as the sun begins its descent, the scene will shift; expect a veil of drizzle to settle in after 10 PM, transforming the atmosphere into one thick with moisture and subdued colors. The low tonight promises a cozy 47 degrees, nudging upwards to 49 as the night matures. 

As you step out, consider wrapping yourself in layers—a lightweight jacket will serve you well against both the coolness of the day and the impending drizzle. You might take a leisurely stroll through nearby parks or perhaps find a quiet café, curling up with a book and warm drink, as the clouds cocoon the city and the drizzle whispers against the pavement. Embrace the charm of this moment; it’s a beautiful time in San Francisco when the world seems to slow, encouraging a pause, a reflection, and a chance to appreciate the cozy embrace of urban life under the wash of a muted sky.
